It's been my expereince that you need to supply something for the 
entities to form voices out of, doesn't matter how you do it, they 
will use what you use. I use radio a convinient source of this raw 
audio, that's the only reason I use radio tuners. It's possible some 
of the vocies come in on an RF carrier, but I can't tell.
